content: skeleton sweater dk version supplies dk yarn at least 30 grams size 5 dpns or circular for magic loop bor marker darning needle scrap yarn for sleeves measuring tape note using fingering weight and size 1 needles the sample size will fit a 15 inch skeleton sample shown in bumblebee acres farm squishy dk in the colorway witch s cauldron abbrevia1ons o1o yarn over knit 1 yarn over these are your raglan increases on odd row knit yo through the back loop to avoid a hole cast on 40 s1tches join the the round place bor marker body row 1 knit row 2 k7 o1o k6 o1o k10 o1o k6 o1o k7 48 st row 3 knit and all odd row going forward row 4 k8 o1o k8 o1o k12 o1o k8 o1o k8 56 st row 6 k9 o1o k10 o1o k14 o1o k10 o1o k9 64 st row 8 k10 o1o k12 o1o k16 o1o k12 o1o k10 72 st row 10 k11 o1o k14 o1o k18 o1o k14 o1o k11 80 st row 11 knit row 12 k11 slip next 16 s1tches to waste yarn k24 slip next 16 s1tches to waste yarn k to bor con1nue kni=ng body in the round to your desired length add ½ an inch of 2x2 ribbing k2 p2 repeat around and bind off loosely sleeves pick-up 16 s1tches plus 2 for the sleeves knit un1l desired length do the same for the second sleeve block gently and adore your skeleton this paeern was wrieen for a standard 19-20 inch skeleton i purchased mine from oriental trading company but they can be found most anywhere around halloween ques1ons comments concerns feel free to email me at seaturtlegrrl@gmail com if you love this paeern and would like to support my work please feel free to drop me a ko-fi ko- fi com/witchinkni=nmama
